comment: Just as addiction has no discrimination ... relapses can also happen to anyone and at anytime . The reason I started Mindful Moms Recovery Group is so moms in recovery have a place to talk about what works and what doesn t This group is all about support and resources . <URL>
amr:

comment: Mindfulness has been such an improvement in my life as well as my sobriety . Practicing mindfulness in sobriety is crucial because it is a great tool to reduce triggers , boredom and greatly increases appreciation for life and one s surroundings .
amr:

comment: Mindful Moms Recovery Group meets every Wednesday at :30- :30 at N . Main Street , Fall River MA at Peer Peer . Please share this , you never know which one of your friends may be suffering and not know where or who to reach out to The public post is available on my FB page .
